text: is a Japanese singer and actress. She is a former second-generation member and the former leader of the Japanese idol girl group Angerme. ==Biography== Akari Takeuchi was born on November 23, 1997, in Saitama, Japan. In 2008, Takeuchi joined Hello! Pro Egg alongside Mizuki Fukumura and Rie Kaneko. In 2011, Takeuchi as well as Kana Nakanishi, Fuyuka Kosuga, Rina Katsuta and Meimi Tamura were announced as sub-members of S/mileage. Takeuchi succeeded Ayaka Wada as the leader of Angerme on June 19, 2019. On December 20, 2022, Takeuchi announced her graduation from Angerme and Hello! Project to happen in Spring 2023. On June 20, 2023, she officially graduated from Angerme and Hello! Project with a concert dedicated for her graduation held at Yokohama Arena. ==References== Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Singers from Saitama Prefecture
title: Akari Takeuchi
